DOC.brief_summary: This cluster-randomised controlled trial will test the hypothesis that a multifaceted program with psychological intervention in morbidity mortality conferences (MMC) improve care quality and reduce the rate of morbidity mortality perinatal in diverse obstetric care settings.
DOC.brief_title: Intervention of Psychological and Ethical Professionals of Human Science in Obstetrical Morbidity and Mortality Conferences (OPERA)
DOC.criteria: all newborns born between 1er october 2008 and 30 November 2010 (minimum : 22 weeks of gestation) newborns died in context of abortion
